name: Jedi Mod
description:
NEW:
Sling and Cat.

CHANGE:
B.Fury now finally works on the card in action (if you kill with the bottled card it remaisn in your hand). 
 Unlimited Power no longer exhausts, but does same thing as above.

I am well aware that sword boomerang doesn't work with archwiz hat, but due to code limitations can't do much with it.
